ygData.subject: Necros use in raids
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I haven t ever been on a raid myself, but as far as I know a Necro s main role seems to be as mana battery, from what I hear. Bah....when will people
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I haven't ever been on a raid myself, but as far as I know a
Necro's main role seems to be as mana battery, from what I hear.
Bah....when will people ever wake up and realise how good a Necro is?
We're low-maintenance 'cause we can heal ourselves and have spells of
our own that are better than the Chanter's Breeze line. We also kick
arse with our DOTs and to a lesser extent our DDs (SOP is awesome,
and the DD vs Undead line is cool too). And I consider the pet as
half a Tank. Yet when I go into a zone LFG, there's loads of other
people LFG too, yet they all seem to get groups and I don't. Once I
waited 5 hours in OT for a group and didn't get one. I know Necros
are apparantly so good at soloing but it does get boring and even we
have to med for some time if we use all our mana. And we go down
quick if we're being hit and FD doesn't work or we're oom.
Ah, just pouring out what I think here. What does everyone else think?
